Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula
Review Date: 2020/06/11
Store: Pure Daily Care
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'}
Review Text: This hand sanitizer by Puretize is great. During the time of the pandemic, this is a must! It contains 70% alcohol, which is great to kill those nasty germs 🦠! It smells similar to rubbing alcohol, however it’s not too strong. I love this hand sanitizer as it doesn’t dry out my hands like others. Every family needs a bottle of this in their home!
Review Title: Sanitizes without drying out hands!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

{'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.3 x 1.3 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '632726043414'}
My wife has been using this product for about a week and likes it. It’s very easy to apply, just like clear liquid eyeliner. It’s good that it does not irritate my wife’s sensitive skin at all. She has tried on her lashes and has noticed a slight difference in the thickness of them. I am sure that time will bring more dramatic results. The product is a bit pricey for the amount you get though.
Easy to apply, does not irritate.

profile:
**User Summary:**

The user maintains a strong preference for skin care products, focusing on effective solutions such as under-eye treatments for puffiness and dark circles. They prioritize practicality and ease of use, favoring items that deliver instant hydration and refreshing sensations. The user appreciates products that enhance sensory experiences, often highlighting the benefits of cooling items like masks.

Recently, they demonstrated a family-centric approach to skin care by sharing positive feedback about a gentle face cleanser their wife enjoys, emphasizing its moisturizing qualities and suitability for sensitive skin. They also value beautifully scented products but are flexible in exploring options that resonate with loved ones, regardless of scent.

In their latest interaction, the user expressed satisfaction with a hand sanitizer that provides effective germ-killing properties while being gentle on the skin, showcasing their focus on family needs and practical solutions. This aligns with their commitment to ensuring the use of functional products that enhance health and well-being for themselves and their family.

Overall, the user seeks skin care options that blend immediate benefits with sensory pleasure while showing an evolving awareness of natural and cruelty-free ingredients. Their approach underscores the importance of practical, effective routines while remaining dedicated to both personal care and the wellbeing of their family.
